data.price: 1. Nabiyow Yallih qokol (cató) kee makki fakim koh Yamaate waqdi.
2. Kaadu seehadá Yallih diinit butta buttah culah table waqdi,
data.arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan

data.price: 3. Toysa Ku-Rabbi saytunnos kaa faylisak, kaadu dambi cabti kaal esser,, diggah usuk isil gaca marak gacim (toobat kinnuk) oggolaah qafu aba Rabbi kinnik.
data.arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa-is'taghfir'hu innahu kāna tawwāban

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
